name: Custom Object Update by UID
description: This API is used to update the specified custom object data of a specified account. If the value of updatetype is 'replace' then it will fully replace custom object with new custom object and if the value of updatetype is partialreplace then it will perform an upsert type operation.

Get Params.name: updatetype
Get Params.description: Possible values: replace, partialreplace. Find more details here

Template Params.name: uid
Template Params.description: UID, the unified identifier for each user account

Template Params.name: objectrecordid
Template Params.description: Unique identifier of the user's record in Custom Object
